title: I bet Riot technicians new this would happen but Riot managers are telling them to make it work.
body:
I'm not calling anybody out, I get it, paying hundreds of thousands of dollars for more and better servers isn't what boss man like to see. I don't play Clash, I don't really care about it, I just want Nexus Blitz, however I wouldn't be opposed to Riot stopping/slowing all normal and ranked games for a couple of days on specific times (with advance notice of course) in order for the severs to actually run Clash flawlessly.

That would work wouldn't it?
